name: Hopscotch: Back to childhood
description:
Have you ever remembered and regretted your childhood? Did you miss it a lot?
Don’t worry, Hopscotch: Back to childhood which the most popular playground game is on your screen right now.
Let’s swipe the screen to hop through the squares.
Play Hopscotch: Back to childhood and deep into little kid's remembrance and have fun!
What are you waiting for?
Let’s play the most addictive game ever.
